name: Appsfire
description: Appsfire is a leading, global discovery and distribution platform for mobile apps focused on the groundbreaking next-generation of native ad units for mobile devices and ad technologies services to developers and publishers. Appsfire’s business operates on both the iOS and Android platforms. We help developers accelerate their user acquisition, engagement, and monetization cycle with a unique set of non-incentivized advertising units exposed to millions of users all over the world.
